scripts.format: npm run format:server && npm run format:client
scripts.format:server: cd SeventySix.Server && dotnet build SeventySix.Analyzers --configuration Release --no-incremental && dotnet build && dotnet csharpier format . && dotnet format analyzers --severity warn && dotnet format && dotnet format
scripts.format:client: cd SeventySix.Client && npx eslint "src/**/*.ts" --fix && npx dprint fmt && npx eslint "src/**/*.ts" --fix
scripts.test: npm run test:server && npm run test:client
scripts.test:server: powershell -Command "if (-not (Get-Process 'Docker Desktop' -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue)) { Start-Process 'C:\Program Files\Docker\Docker\Docker Desktop.exe'; Start-Sleep -Seconds 10 }" && cd SeventySix.Server && dotnet build && dotnet test
scripts.start: powershell -Command "if (-not (Get-Process 'Docker Desktop' -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue)) { Start-Process 'C:\Program Files\Docker\Docker\Docker Desktop.exe'; Start-Sleep -Seconds 10 }" && cd SeventySix.Server && docker compose build seventysix-api --no-cache && docker compose --env-file ../.env up -d --force-recreate && powershell -ExecutionPolicy Bypass -File ../scripts/wait-for-api.ps1 && cd ../SeventySix.Client && npm start
